snippet: Elliott Management criticized a letter sent by Hess’s chief executive, John B. Hess, to another dissident investor, arguing the letter showed the company and its management lacked accountability.
abstract: Elliott Management criticized a letter sent by Hess’s chief executive, John B. Hess, to another dissident investor, arguing the letter showed the company and its management lacked accountability.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Elliott Criticizes Hess Chief as Unaccountable
